Text:
I am looking for the Marvel series Nth Man The Ultimate Ninja by Larry Hama. 
And thanks for uploading this.
Just wondering, why not just wait the two months; and, upload a complete series?
@xenoFlash Trying to get everyone caught up. That and my computer is 12 terabytes and nearly filled up.
thx u so man " i finally get to catch up

The torrent is stuck at 64.5% for myself, and most of the peers I see... someone who has all of the content needs to seed. 

I will gladly seed this excellent torrent, but first I need the files!

C'mon guys

It's ending at 700?  That's a HUGE shame.  As a thrice monthly, ASM was on pace to become the first comic to LEGITIMATELY reach issue 1000.  Guess the honor will now go to DC (likely with Action or Detective).

Hey man- you have a hiccup here. At issue #442, it starts with v2 #3 and v2 issues #1 & #2 are found at #508 & #509 respectively. Easily remedied- just thought you should know. Anyways, awesome torrent.
